item.title: 天然气从 "桥梁 "转变为目的地
item.description:
一些电力公司已不再将这种燃料称为可再生能源的临时途径，而是将其作为长期计划的核心。【原文：

Some power companies have stopped calling the fuel a temporary pathway to renewable energy and are making it central to their long-range plans.

】

item.title: 西班牙法官将调查停电是否为网络攻击
item.description: 西班牙国家法院的一名法官已展开调查，以确定周一的全国大停电是否是一次网络攻击。【原文：A judge in Spain’s national court has opened an investigation to determine whether Monday’s countrywide blackout was a cyberattack.】

item.title: 可折叠手机需要更好的软件来激发更广泛的兴趣
item.description: 欢迎阅读《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），我们每天为您提供彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Takashi Mochizuki 重新考虑了他早期对可折叠手机的热情。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Takashi Mochizuki reconsiders his early enthusiasm for foldable phones.】

item.title: 世界 "奇迹 "经济失去魔力
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特（Malcolm Scott），驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，我们将关注澳大利亚经济实力的衰退和即将到来的联邦大选。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today, we’re looking at Australia’s fading economic strength and its upcoming federal election. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 洛杉矶港务局局长认为货运放缓前景 "黯淡
item.description: 还记得大流行病造成的贸易中断吗？那些困扰南加州港口的供需失衡问题？类似的情况可能很快就会重现。【原文：Remember the trade disruptions from the pandemic? All those supply-and-demand imbalances that bedeviled ports in Southern California? Something similar could soon return.】

item.title: 英国抵押贷款利率降至 2022 年特鲁斯危机以来最低点
item.description: 在利兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）的小型预算案导致市场陷入低迷前不久，英国的短期抵押贷款交易已降至 2022 年 9 月以来的最低水平。【原文：Short-term mortgage deals in the UK have fallen to their lowest rate since September 2022, shortly before markets were sent into a tailspin by Liz Truss’s mini-budget.】

item.title: 让西班牙陷入黑暗的五秒钟
item.description: 马德里时间周一中午 12 点 33 分，西班牙电网运行平稳。但在随后的几秒钟内，一系列至今仍扑朔迷离的事件造成了该国近代史上最严重的停电事故。【原文：At 12:33 p.m. Madrid time on Monday, the Spanish electric grid was running smoothly. But in the following few seconds, a series of still mysterious events caused the worst blackout in the country’s recent history.】

item.title: 策略师称现在是加强股票套期保值的时候了
item.description:
Susquehanna 和道明证券敦促投资者购买下跌保险。【原文：

Susquehanna and TD Securities are urging investors buy downside insurance.

】

item.title: 迪卡侬将就出售中国业务股权展开谈判
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，迪卡侬公司（Decathlon SA）已开始着手出售约 30% 的中国业务。【原文：Decathlon SA has started a process to sell about 30% of its China business, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 西班牙瘫痪性停电可能由发电设备故障引起
item.description: 西班牙国家支持的输电线路运营商表示，周一伊比利亚半岛大部分地区停电，是欧洲多年来最严重的停电之一，很可能是由于发电损失造成的。【原文：Spain’s state-backed operator of electricity transmission lines said that one of Europe’s worst blackouts in years, which knocked out power to much of the Iberian peninsula on Monday, was most likely caused by losses in generation.】

item.title: 泰国央行在议息会议前警告贸易战风暴来袭
item.description: 泰国央行行长在普遍预计泰国利率委员会将下调政策利率的前一天警告说，全球贸易战加剧的 "风暴 "迫在眉睫，泰国央行行长强调了关注稳定的必要性。【原文：Thailand’s central bank governor underscored the need to focus on stability as he warned of an imminent “storm” from an intensifying global trade war, a day before the nation’s rate panel is widely expected to cut its policy interest rate.】

item.title: Spotify 用户数量增长 12%，超过预期
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 公布的第一季度用户数量超过了分析师的预期，这表明这家流媒体服务公司将业务范围从音乐扩展到有声读物和播客的战略正在吸引更多的粉丝，即使它提高了价格。【原文：Spotify Technology SA reported more subscribers than analysts expected in the first quarter, showing that the streaming service’s strategy of expanding beyond music into audiobooks and podcasts is luring more fans even as it raises prices.】

item.title: 德债主管认为投资者将逐渐撤出国债投资
item.description: 德国债务机构联合负责人表示，受唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易关税引发的动荡影响，投资者可能会逐渐远离美国国债。【原文：Investors spooked by the upheaval caused by President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs are likely to gradually shift away from US Treasuries, according to the co-head of Germany’s debt agency.】

item.title: 英国石油公司首席执行官称，石油价格低于 70 美元时，他仍能坚持重启计划
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）首席执行官穆雷-奥金克洛斯（Murray Auchincloss）表示，尽管近期油价下跌，但该公司的战略重置有了一个 "良好的开端"，并能继续实现扭亏为盈。【原文：BP Plc is off to a “great start” in its strategy reset and can follow through on the turnaround despite the recent drop in oil prices, said Chief Executive Officer Murray Auchincloss.】

item.title: 人工智能可能回落，微软和亚马逊资本支出成焦点
item.description: 本周，云计算领域最大的两家公司将公布财报，投资者对它们的支出额和收入额同样感兴趣。【原文：When the two biggest players in cloud computing report earnings this week, the amount the companies are spending will be just as interesting to investors as how much they are making.】

item.title: 莫迪祝贺卡尼赢得加拿大大选，紧张局势有所缓和
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪祝贺马克-卡尼领导的自由党在加拿大全国大选中获胜，指出两国关系有望进一步解冻。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulated Mark Carney for his Liberal Party’s victory in Canada’s national election, pointing to the prospect of a further thaw in relations between the two countries.】

item.title: 意大利 Recordati 公司认为关税波动促进了交易达成
item.description: 意大利制药商 Recordati SpA 正在寻求收购，称市场波动和关税的影响为廉价收购创造了潜力。【原文：Italian drugmaker Recordati SpA is on the lookout for acquisitions, saying market volatility and the impact of tariffs have created the potential for cheaper buyouts.】

item.title: 联合利华和信实集团看到印度消费者需求复苏的迹象
item.description: 消费者公司看到了印度 4 亿城市购物者需求回升的早期迹象，这为印度与美国的贸易谈判可能引发的任何波动提供了缓冲。【原文：Consumers companies are seeing early signs of demand pick up among the 400-million strong group of urban shoppers in India, providing a buffer to any volatility that might be unleashed by the country’s trade negotiations with the US.】

item.title: 中国要求制药商和医院寻找美国进口替代品
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中国已要求一些国有制药商研究如何减少在医药产品和原材料方面对美国的依赖，因为中国政府正在为可能出现的威胁其医疗供应的脱钩做准备。【原文：China has asked some of its state-owned drugmakers to study how they can reduce reliance on the US for pharmaceutical products and raw materials, people familiar with the matter said, as Beijing prepares for a potential decoupling that threatens its medical supply.】

item.title: 波动性专家称，立即购买 S&P 500 指数下行保险
item.description: 美国股市刚刚从低点爆发性反弹。一些市场波动观察家说，不要太舒服了。【原文：US stocks just notched an explosive rebound from their lows. Don’t get too comfortable, say some of the market’s volatility watchers.】

item.title: 来自中国的包裹激增，法国要求对小包裹收费
item.description: 法国正在推动对特姆优和申银万国集团有限公司等中国折扣零售商的小包装商品征收关税，以阻止因美国实施全面关税而有可能加速的商品流动。【原文：France is pushing to slap fees on small packages from discount Chinese retailers including Temu and Shein Group Ltd. in an effort to stem a flow that risks accelerating as the US implements sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的 Rover 收购 Gudog，进军欧洲宠物护理市场
item.description: 为宠物主人和遛狗者及保姆牵线搭桥的平台 Rover Group Inc.【原文：Rover Group Inc., a platform that connects pet owners to walkers and sitters, is buying Dublin-based marketplace Gudog as it eyes more buyouts and organic growth in Europe.】

item.title: 石油泄漏后，俄罗斯关闭了约 62 英里的黑海海滩
item.description: 俄罗斯关闭了约 62 英里（100 公里）的黑海海滩，因为 12 月发生了一起燃料泄漏事件，导致环境损失索赔约 10 亿美元。【原文：Russia shut about 62 miles (100 kilometers) of Black Sea beaches, after a December fuel spill that’s resulted in environmental damage claims of about $1 billion.】

item.title: 中国人寿利润上升，投资收益显示出韧性
item.description: 中国人寿保险股份有限公司（China Life Insurance Co.【原文：China Life Insurance Co. said profit rose 40% in the first quarter as client demand boosted policy sales and its investments showed resilience during a stock market decline.】

item.title: 中国工商银行利润下滑，大型银行利润率受创
item.description: 中国工商银行第一季度利润下降，原因是降息给中国最大的贷款机构带来压力，而且贸易争端进一步威胁到收入。【原文：China’s Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd. posted a decline in profit in the first quarter as interest rate cuts weigh on the nation’s biggest lenders and a trade dispute further threatens income.】

item.title: 中国石油因油气产量上升而利润增加
item.description: 由于产量增加抵消了油价下跌的影响，中国石油天然气股份有限公司第一季度利润上升。【原文：PetroChina Co.’s profits rose in the first quarter as increased output offset lower oil prices.】

item.title: 德意志银行称贸易动荡是赢得市场份额的机会
item.description: 德意志银行首席财务官表示，美国突然提高关税引发的动荡是银行从竞争对手手中抢夺业务的机会。【原文：The turmoil caused by the sudden hike in US tariffs is an opportunity for banks to grab business from competitors, according to Deutsche Bank AG’s Chief Financial Officer.】

item.title: 油价下跌影响产量增长，中国石油集团利润下降
item.description: 由于全球原油价格下跌，中国最大的海上原油钻探商中国石油天然气股份有限公司第一季度利润下降。【原文：Cnooc Ltd., China’s biggest offshore driller of crude oil, saw profits fall in the first quarter after a drop in global prices.】

item.title: 中央银行推高融资成本，土耳其里拉困境缓解
item.description: 土耳其里拉面临的压力正显示出缓解的早期迹象，土耳其央行正在推进更积极的紧缩政策，以缓冲国内政治和全球贸易风险。【原文：The pressure on Turkey’s lira is showing early signs of easing, with the central bank pushing ahead with more aggressive tightening to provide a buffer from domestic political and global trade risks.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席财务官称欧盟证券化改革将促进增长
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）首席财务官詹姆斯-冯-莫尔特克（James von Moltke）表示，欧盟关于贷款证券化的新规则将促进该集团的经济发展，因为它能使银行增加贷款。【原文：The European Union’s new set of rules on the securitization of loans is set to bolster the bloc’s economy as it enables banks to boost lending, Deutsche Bank Chief Financial Officer James von Moltke said.】
